question: Whis is the host country of 27th session of the Universal Periodic Review (UPR) of the UN Human Rights Council (UNHRC)?
explanation: The 27th Session of the Universal Periodic Review (UPR) Working Group has started at the UN Human Rights Council (UNHRC) in Geneva, Switzerland. Attorney General of India Mukul Rohatgi is leading the Indian delegation. The National Report of India covers areas that were part of the recommendations accepted by India following the UPR-II in 2012.
